casebody.data:
98-3081 (La. 4/1/99)

STATE ex rel. Tony CAPERS v. STATE of Louisiana. No. 98-KH-3081. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Capers, Tony; — Plaintiffs); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs; Parish of Bossier 26th Judicial District Court Div. “A” Number 79683; to the Court of Appeal, Second Circuit, Number 31800-KH

Denied.

KNOLL, J. not on panel.
